#include<stdio.h>
#define ll long long
#include<limits.h>
int min(int a,int b)
{
    return a>b?b:a;
}
 
int a[1002][1002];
int  b[1002][1002],c[1002][1002],e[1002][1002],f[1002][1002];
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,m,i,j;
        scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
        for(i=0;i<=n+1;i++)
        {
            for(j=0;j<=m+1;j++)
            {b[i][j]=0;c[i][j]=0;e[i][j]=0;f[i][j]=0;}
        }
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            for(j=1;j<=m;j++)
            {
                scanf("%d",&a[i][j]);
                b[i][j]=min(a[i][j]+b[i][j-1],a[i][j]);
            }
        }
        for(i=n;i>=1;i--)
        {
            for(j=m;j>=1;j--)
            {
                c[i][j]=min(a[i][j]+c[i][j+1],a[i][j]);
               // f[j][i]=min(a[j][i]+f[j+1][i],a[j][i]);
                //c[i][j]=min(x,x+b[i][j-1]);
            }
        }
        for(i=1;i<=m;i++)
        {
            for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
            {
                 e[j][i]=min(a[j][i]+e[j-1][i],a[j][i]);
            }
        }
        for(i=m;i>=1;i--)
        {
            for(j=n;j>=1;j--)
            {
                //c[i][j]=min(a[i][j]+c[i][j+1],a[i][j]);
                f[j][i]=min(a[j][i]+f[j+1][i],a[j][i]);
                //c[i][j]=min(x,x+b[i][j-1]);
            }
        }
        ll min1=INT_MAX;
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            for(j=1;j<=m;j++)
            {
                ll x;
                x = (b[i][j]+c[i][j]+e[i][j]+f[i][j])-(3*a[i][j]);
                if(x<min1)
                min1=x;
            }
        }
        printf("%lld\n",min1);
    }
    return 0;
}
